title: Gimme A Burger
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Fast-casual burger eatery offering build-your-own possibility with 3 of the burger patties being vegan: quinoa, falafel, and veganator (bean & veggies). You could get the patty in a burger or wrap. Vegans ask for the egg-less wheat buns. Variety of sides available including fries, peppered fries, thick cut fires, sweet potato waffle fries, beer battered onion rings, and a red quinoa bowl. A fryer is reserved for vegan customers, so mention that when ordering.
